In this case we're calling convert which does not guarantee the incoming
object is mutated.  Since runtime.Object is an interface and we use some
other types in interfaces that aren't purely serializable
(runtime.Encodable) it's not safe to copy.  I can make a comment in the
godoc of runtime.Extension that it does not perform a copy.
